title: 1983년 Ruvolo 사건
summary: 미국 Florida, FL 법원 판결 사건. 사건명: Ruvolo. 판결일: 1983-11-02. 법원: District Court of Appeal of Florida.
description:
## 사건 정보

**사건명**: STATE of Florida v. Keith Anthony RUVOLO
**판결일**: 1983-11-02
**법원**: District Court of Appeal of Florida
**관할**: Florida, FL

**판사**: Beranek, Dell, Walden

## 변호인

Jim Smith, Atty. Gen., Tallahassee, and Sharon Lee Stedman, Asst. Atty. Gen., West Palm Beach, for appellant., Richard L. Jorandby, Public Defender, and Louis G. Carres, Asst. Public Defender, West Palm Beach, for appellee.

## 인용

- 439 So. 2d 1045

## 판결문 요약


PER CURIAM.
We find the allegations contained in the information charging appellee with burglary sufficient to meet the standard set forth in State v. Waters, 436 So.2d 66 (Fla.1983). We recognize that the Supreme Court had not issued its opinion at the time the trial court dismissed the information.
REVERSED and REMANDED.
BERANEK, DELL and WALDEN, JJ., concur.
...
